description:
Advanced API Debugging Proxy

Reqable is a flutter-based, cross-platform app, which enables developers to capture, inspect, and manipulate HTTP(s) requests/responses with ease. Support Windows, macOS, linux, iOS and Android devices.
ğŸ’ª [OPT] Replace cURL command parser.
ğŸ’ª [OPT] Importing curl no longer blocks if a file is not found.
ğŸ’ª [OPT] form-data adds a warning for missing files.
ğŸ’ª [OPT] Compatible with some non-standard `content-type` types.
ğŸ’ª [OPT] Display the activated environment variable name instead of icon in the home page.
ğŸ’ª [OPT] Right-clicking the `+` on the home tab bar can directly create an HTTP request.
ğŸ’ª [OPT] Script support for assigning `request.contentType` and `response.contentType`.
ğŸ’ª [OPT] Traffic list supports status code conditional search.
ğŸ’ª [OPT] When a script interrupts a request, the console displays relevant information instead of an error.
ğŸ [FIX] HEX view in WebSocket and SSE could not gain focus, causing shortcut keys to be not working.
ğŸ [FIX] SSE view in traffic list did not display data due to encodings.
ğŸ [FIX] XML prettify did not correctly handle nested `>` and `<` characters.
ğŸ [FIX] Importing cURL did not handle single and double quotes correctly.
ğŸ [FIX] Script editor may freeze.
ğŸ [FIX] Script editor `Editing` and `Saved` status may display incorrectly.
ğŸ [FIX] API script did not clean up files after execution.
ğŸ [FIX] The dialog title of environment variable creation was incorrect.
ğŸ [FIX] Running node or commands dependent on node in the proxy terminal caused errors.
